```{r}
library(fable)
library(tsibble)
library(tsibbledata)
library(lubridate)
library(dplyr)
library(future.apply)
library(ggfortify)
load("df_min_temp.rdata")
```




```{r}
test <- df_min_temp %>%
  select(dates, value) %>% 
  distinct(dates, .keep_all= TRUE) %>% 
  as_tsibble(key=value, index = dates)

hist(test$value)


```

```{r}
temp <- ts(df_min_temp[,3], frequency = 365, start = c(2006, 1), end = c(2099,365))
decomp_temp <- decompose(temp)
plot(decomp_temp, col=our_purple)
```


```{r}
birthsSeasonAdj <- temp - decomp_temp$seasonal 
plot.ts(birthsSeasonAdj)
plot.ts(decomp_temp$trend)
```
